data.text:
Spe-chan, over here～. 
We're already connected to El.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, over here～. 
<story>We're already connected to El.

data.text: Sorry for the wait～! Hello, El-chan!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Sorry for the wait～! Hello, El-chan!?

data.text: 『Oh, Spe-chan has arrived, huh?』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>『Oh, Spe-chan has arrived, huh?』

data.text:
Bonjooour～! Everyone seems to be doing well! 
Of course, El is doing well tooooo!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Bonjooour～! Everyone seems to be doing well! 
<story>Of course, El is doing well tooooo!

data.text:
Spe-chan, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was great! 
Sei-chan, it was a nice run too!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was great! 
<story>Sei-chan, it was a nice run too!

data.text: 『But well～, Spe-chan really got me good though～』
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>『But well～, Spe-chan really got me good though～』

data.text:
『Because of that, ever since then, I haven't 
been able to sleep well at night. Because of 
that, I'm always really sleepy during class』
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>『Because of that, ever since then, I haven't 
<story>been able to sleep well at night. Because of 
<story>that, I'm always really sleepy during class』

data.text: 『Eeh～～!? I-is that true!?』
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>『Eeh～～!? I-is that true!?』

data.text: 『Isn't sleeping in class normal for Sky-san?』
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>『Isn't sleeping in class normal for Sky-san?』

data.text:
『They got mad at me for sleeping in class too…… The class before 
was in the pool, so I ended up using all of my strength there……』
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>『They got mad at me for sleeping in class too…… The class before 
<story>was in the pool, so I ended up using all of my strength there……』

data.text: Ahahaa! Everyone seems like their usual self, huh～.
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Ahahaa! Everyone seems like their usual self, huh～.

data.text:
El-chan, it's amazing that you've won a G1 overseas! 
Even on the news over here, El-chan is the hot topic!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>El-chan, it's amazing that you've won a G1 overseas! 
<story>Even on the news over here, El-chan is the hot topic!

data.text:
『Fufuun, so this must be what it feels like to be famous, huh!? 
But, these results aren't enough to satisfy El!』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>『Fufuun, so this must be what it feels like to be famous, huh!? 
<story>But, these results aren't enough to satisfy El!』

data.text:
『I'm aiming for proof that I'm the world's strongest! Conquering 
a big race that no Japanese Uma Musume has won before――』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>『I'm aiming for proof that I'm the world's strongest! Conquering 
<story>a big race that no Japanese Uma Musume has won before――』

data.text:
『Victory at the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, I'll show you that 
I'll definitely be the one to do it!』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>『Victory at the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, I'll show you that 
<story>I'll definitely be the one to do it!』

data.text: Yeah! We'll be cheering for you too!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! We'll be cheering for you too!

data.text:
It won't be just us either. Everyone 
in Japan will be cheering El on.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>It won't be just us either. Everyone 
<story>in Japan will be cheering El on.

data.text:
As a close friend, and a rival that I can take pride in, I'm 
expecting a wonderful race from you.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>As a close friend, and a rival that I can take pride in, I'm 
<story>expecting a wonderful race from you.

data.text:
『I'm expecting great things from your efforts too～! And then 
someday, let's promise to have another battle!』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>『I'm expecting great things from your efforts too～! And then 
<story>someday, let's promise to have another battle!』

data.text: ……Yes, once more for sure.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……Yes, once more for sure.

data.text: Alright, now it's King's turn to talk!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Alright, now it's King's turn to talk!

data.text: Wait, wait, I'm next in line though, right?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Wait, wait, I'm next in line though, right?

data.text: Aaah!? Me too!! Me too!!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Aaah!? Me too!! Me too!!

data.text: ……El-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……El-chan.

data.text:
They round the 4th corner in to the straight! This year's Derby 
Uma Musume, Special Week, quickly moves to the outside!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>They round the 4th corner in to the straight! This year's Derby 
<story>Uma Musume, Special Week, quickly moves to the outside!

data.text:
Special Week, it's Special Week! The Senior class dignified 
"Empress" Air Groove also moves forward!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Special Week, it's Special Week! The Senior class dignified 
<story>"Empress" Air Groove also moves forward!

data.text:
But it's El Condor, El Condor! 
El Condor Pasa takes the lead and crosses the goal!!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>But it's El Condor, El Condor! 
<story>El Condor Pasa takes the lead and crosses the goal!!

data.text:
Seems like there was nothing to worry about when it comes to 
distance! El Condor Pasa, part of the Classic Class, 
magnificiently conquers the 『Japan Cup』!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Seems like there was nothing to worry about when it comes to 
<story>distance! El Condor Pasa, part of the Classic Class, 
<story>magnificiently conquers the 『Japan Cup』!

data.text: Haa……Haaa……! Haaa……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa……Haaa……! Haaa……!

data.text: Haa……fuu……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Haa……fuu……

data.text: ……That was an awesome, heated race, Spe-chan!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……That was an awesome, heated race, Spe-chan!

data.text: Haa…… Haa…… Ehehe, yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa…… Haa…… Ehehe, yeah!

data.text: (In last year's 『Japan Cup』―― El-chan was really amazing……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(In last year's 『Japan Cup』―― El-chan was really amazing……)

data.text:
(That a race could be this amazing, and that I could take on an 
even bigger challenge. It feels like she taught me that……)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(That a race could be this amazing, and that I could take on an 
<story>even bigger challenge. It feels like she taught me that……)

data.text:
(Just watching her makes me excited…… 
and that's why everyone has big expectation of El-chan)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>(Just watching her makes me excited…… 
<story>and that's why everyone has big expectation of El-chan)

data.text: (……me too. I want to be an Uma Musume like that……!)
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>(……me too. I want to be an Uma Musume like that……!)

data.text:
The first half of the Twinkle Series culminates with the 
『Takarazuka Kinen』――
data.processed:
<story>The first half of the Twinkle Series culminates with the 
<story>『Takarazuka Kinen』――

data.text:
With that grand stage approaching, 
Special Week's training intensified.
data.processed:
<story>With that grand stage approaching, 
<story>Special Week's training intensified.

data.text: Daaa～～～～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Daaa～～～～!!

data.text:
Fuu～……3 laps on the dirt, finished! 
Trainer-san, which type of training is next!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Fuu～……3 laps on the dirt, finished! 
<story>Trainer-san, which type of training is next!?

data.text:
Alright, let's try slope running next. Focus on not losing any 
speed, even with the additional burden on your body.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, let's try slope running next. Focus on not losing any 
<story>speed, even with the additional burden on your body.

data.text: Yeah! Alright, I'll get started then!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! Alright, I'll get started then!

data.text: Seems like Special Week-san is really motivated.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Seems like Special Week-san is really motivated.

data.text:
First in fan votes……it just hit me but, 
even with that she seems to be fine.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>First in fan votes……it just hit me but, 
<story>even with that she seems to be fine.

data.text:
Of course I'm being careful so she doesn't get too excited, but 
it's still a good thing. It seems like she's really fulfilled.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course I'm being careful so she doesn't get too excited, but 
<story>it's still a good thing. It seems like she's really fulfilled.

data.text: Fulfilled is it……?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Fulfilled is it……?

data.text:
Like when we were planning for the 『Spring Tenno 
Sho』, doing trial and error with Trainer-san, 
it kind of reminds me of that same feeling.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Like when we were planning for the 『Spring Tenno 
<story>Sho』, doing trial and error with Trainer-san, 
<story>it kind of reminds me of that same feeling.

data.text:
The feeling of "Chasing your dreams", maybe Special Week-san is 
feeling that right now.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>The feeling of "Chasing your dreams", maybe Special Week-san is 
<story>feeling that right now.

data.text: Chasing your dreams, huh……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Chasing your dreams, huh……

data.text: Alright, let's end today's training here.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Alright, let's end today's training here.

data.text: Alright, let's end today's training here.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Alright, let's end today's training here.

data.text: Okaaaay! Good work out there!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Okaaaay! Good work out there!!

data.text:
That said, today you were awesome out there, Spe-chan! Fighting 
spirit at max～ or something, it was rough keeping up with you.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>That said, today you were awesome out there, Spe-chan! Fighting 
<story>spirit at max～ or something, it was rough keeping up with you.

data.text:
Ehehe, it kind of felt like the power just 
kept welling up from inside my body!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, it kind of felt like the power just 
<story>kept welling up from inside my body!

data.text:
With the way Spe-san is right now, it seems like it'll be a good 
run at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』……!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>With the way Spe-san is right now, it seems like it'll be a good 
<story>run at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』……!

data.text: Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!

data.text: Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!

data.text:
Ah, um……Trainer-san! 
Actually, I have a request!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah, um……Trainer-san! 
<story>Actually, I have a request!

data.text:
Right now, with Suzuka-san running in America, and El-chan 
running in France, lots of people are cheering them on, right?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Right now, with Suzuka-san running in America, and El-chan 
<story>running in France, lots of people are cheering them on, right?

data.text:
As Japanese Uma Musume, as representatives of Japan 
as they challenge the world, they're shouldering 
the expectations of all the fans in Japan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>As Japanese Uma Musume, as representatives of Japan 
<story>as they challenge the world, they're shouldering 
<story>the expectations of all the fans in Japan.

data.text:
Up until now, I was talking about how I thought aiming to be "An 
Uma Musume that could make everyone smile" would bring me closer 
to being "Japan's #1", but―
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Up until now, I was talking about how I thought aiming to be "An 
<story>Uma Musume that could make everyone smile" would bring me closer 
<story>to being "Japan's #1", but―

data.text:
It seems more like Suzuka-san and El-chan 
are doing what I'm aiming for.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It seems more like Suzuka-san and El-chan 
<story>are doing what I'm aiming for.

data.text:
Carrying the expectations of so many people, and responding to 
those expectations, I want to be an Uma Musume like that too so, 
if I win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Carrying the expectations of so many people, and responding to 
<story>those expectations, I want to be an Uma Musume like that too so, 
<story>if I win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――

data.text:
Just like El-chan, I want to challenge 
the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 too!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Just like El-chan, I want to challenge 
<story>the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 too!

data.text: The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』!? Spe-chan will……!?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』!? Spe-chan will……!?

data.text: Is that why you've been so motivitated?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Is that why you've been so motivitated?

data.text: Yeah……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah……!

data.text:
Fufuu, just like when you first joined the team, 
your goals are still just as big, Special Week-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, just like when you first joined the team, 
<story>your goals are still just as big, Special Week-san.

data.text: W-what do you think…… Trainer-san!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>W-what do you think…… Trainer-san!

data.text:
My reaction was the same as the other team members', unable to 
hide my surprise at Special Week's words.
data.processed:
<story>My reaction was the same as the other team members', unable to 
<story>hide my surprise at Special Week's words.

data.text:
However, her eyes were serious, her strong desire to chase her 
dream to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was conveyed properly――
data.processed:
<story>However, her eyes were serious, her strong desire to chase her 
<story>dream to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was conveyed properly――

data.text:
With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to 
be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to 
<story>be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?

data.text:
With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to 
be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to 
<story>be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?

data.text:
Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma 
Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show 
them an even greater run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma 
<story>Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show 
<story>them an even greater run.

data.text:
Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma 
Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show 
them an even greater run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma 
<story>Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show 
<story>them an even greater run.

data.text: By that, you mean……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>By that, you mean……!

data.text: Waa……! Yeah!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Waa……! Yeah!!

data.text:
Shouldering everyone's expectations, and wanting to become an Uma 
Musume that can live up to those expectations――
data.processed:
<story>Shouldering everyone's expectations, and wanting to become an Uma 
<story>Musume that can live up to those expectations――

data.text:
A 『Takarazuka Kinen』 with an overseas trip on the line, Special 
Week now had an extraordinary ambition to pour her all in to.
data.processed:
<story>A 『Takarazuka Kinen』 with an overseas trip on the line, Special 
<story>Week now had an extraordinary ambition to pour her all in to.
